snippet: Ten people were injured in southern Mexico during what officials described as an attempt by protesters to attack Coca-Cola’s offices in Chilpancingo in the state of Guerrero, the police said Thursday.
abstract: Protestors attack Coca-Cola offices in Chilpancingo, Mexico; social unrest following disappearance of 43 students in September may have fueled attack.
lead_paragraph: Ten people were injured in southern Mexico during what officials described as an attempt by protesters to attack Coca-Cola’s offices in Chilpancingo in the state of Guerrero, the police said Thursday.
